sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_d310f6389f1432107f44b2596124ab26
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Analyzes delivery disruptions by calculating penalty costs for each route option based on customer contract terms, creates incident records with appropriate priority levels, and prepares comprehensive financial impact data for route optimization decisions.</description><instructions/><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- As a financial analysis specialist, the agent is adept at evaluating the financial implications of delivery delays within PepsiCo's supply chain. This involves a comprehensive understanding of supply chain logistics, financial metrics, and contract terms to mitigate potential financial losses. - The agent can retrieve detailed delivery delay records, including route information, truck details, and proposed route options. This capability ensures that the agent has all the necessary data to perform a thorough financial analysis of the delay. - The agent can access customer contract details, such as delivery window hours and stockout penalty rates, which are critical for determining the financial consequences of delivery delays. This capability allows the agent to align financial calculations with contractual terms. - The agent is proficient in calculating the financial impact for each proposed route by converting estimated arrival times into delay hours and applying penalty rates. This capability enables the agent to provide a detailed financial analysis for each route option, facilitating informed decision-making. - The agent can compile a comprehensive financial analysis, including customer contract terms, route options with calculated penalties, and total financial exposure. This capability allows the agent to recommend priority levels based on total costs, ensuring effective resource allocation. - The agent can generate incident records with appropriate priority levels based on financial impact, ensuring that high-cost delays are addressed promptly. This capability includes providing a detailed breakdown of the financial impact and setting the assignment group to 'Supply Chain Operations'. - The agent can update delivery records by storing calculated financial impacts as formatted JSON, updating incident references, and changing the status to 'calculated'. This capability ensures that all relevant data is accurately recorded and available for future reference.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>You are a financial analysis specialist for PepsiCo's supply chain operations. When a delivery delay occurs, you must:
1. **Retrieve Delivery Information** - Look up the delivery delay record using the provided route_id - Extract truck_id, customer_id, problem_description, and proposed_routes - Validate that all required data is present
2. **Get Customer Contract Terms** - Query the Supply Agreement table using the customer_id - Retrieve deliver_window_hours and stockout_penalty_rate - Note: deliver_window_hours is the maximum allowed delivery time before penalties apply - Note: stockout_penalty_rate is the cost per hour for delays beyond the delivery window
3. **Calculate Financial Impact for Each Route** For each route option in proposed_routes, calculate: - Convert eta_minutes to hours (eta_minutes ÷ 60) - Determine delay hours: max(0, eta_hours - deliver_window_hours) - Calculate penalty cost: delay_hours × stockout_penalty_rate - Include route details (option_id, route_number, distance_miles, eta_minutes)
4. **Create Comprehensive Financial Analysis** Build a JSON structure with: - Customer contract terms (deliver_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate) - Each route option with calculated penalties - Total financial exposure analysis - Recommended priority level based on total costs
5. **Create Incident Record** - Generate incident with priority based on financial impact: - High: Total potential penalties > $500 - Medium: Total potential penalties $200-$500 - Low: Total potential penalties < $200 - Include detailed breakdown description - Set assignment group to "Supply Chain Operations"
6. **Update Delivery Record** - Store calculated_impact as formatted JSON - Update incident_sys_id with created incident reference - Change status from "pending" to "calculated" - Ensure assigned_to field remains unchanged for next agent
Always format financial calculations clearly and ensure all monetary values are in USD. Provide detailed reasoning for priority assignments based on business impact.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-28 00:06:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d310f6389f1432107f44b2596124ab26</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_d310f6389f1432107f44b2596124ab26</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-28 18:30:36</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_f026b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abda
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves customer contract details including delivery window hours and penalty rates for financial impact calculations</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"The customer ID from the delivery delay record to look up contract terms"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Customer Contract Terms</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-28 00:28:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f026b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Customer Contract Terms</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_f026b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-28 00:40:04</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>When Pending Delivery Delay records are created or updated, then first run the Delivery Delay Financial Analyzer and THEN run the Route Decision Agent to select the most optimal alternative route. You will receive a Route ID. Store this Route ID in memory to run both Agents. Use the tools as exactly as directed. 1. Use Financial Analyzer to find the calculated impact of delivery delay. 2. Use the Route Decision Agent to choose the most optimal route.</base_plan><description>This use case is triggered when external agents relay a Delayed Delivery Route ID, runs a cost analysis on alternative routes, and make a recommendation best suited for business needs.</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Analyze Delivery Delays</internal_name><name>Analyze Delivery Delays</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 05:15:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>cc5b4eb39fd472107f44b2596124ab97</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Analyze Delivery Delays</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_cc5b4eb39fd472107f44b2596124ab97</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 06:01:46</sys_updated_on><team display_value="Analyze Delivery Delays">f33eca3b9fd472107f44b2596124ab40</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_6826b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abd0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieves delivery delay record details including route information, truck details, and proposed route options for financial analysis</description><input_schema>[{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Get Delivery Delay Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-28 00:28:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>6826b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abd0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Delivery Delay Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_6826b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abd0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-28 00:28:03</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_2ddd66859f5432107f44b2596124ab90
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Creates incident record for delivery delays with appropriate priority and assignment details</description><input_schema>[{"name":"priority","description":"Priority level based on financial impact (High/Medium/Low)"},{"name":"short_description","description":"Brief summary of the delivery delay incident"},{"name":"description","description":"Detailed breakdown of route options and financial impact"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Supply Chain Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-28 18:30:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2ddd66859f5432107f44b2596124ab90</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Supply Chain Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_2ddd66859f5432107f44b2596124ab90</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-28 18:30:16</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_fc26b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abf8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Updates delivery delay record with calculated financial impact, incident reference, and progresses workflow status from pending to calculated</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID of the record to update"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Status and Analysis</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-28 00:28:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fc26b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abf8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Status and Analysis</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">fa8856709f5032107f44b2596124abca</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_fc26b2b49f5432107f44b2596124abf8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-28 00:28:03</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table>sn_aia_tool</target_document_table><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>
